amendment.description: An amendment numbered 11 printed in Part A of House Report 116-79 to add representatives of service members, veterans, and their families to the list of individuals who qualify for appointment to the Consumer Advisory Board.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Golden amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Golden.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Golden amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
